## Description

## Reason for Delegation
Task requires unit tests for StripeProcessor with mock dependencies and edge case validation across multiple files (StripeProcessor, PaymentAdapterFactory, and potentially PaymentProcessor trait), involving dependency injection, factory pattern, and test isolation. Touches 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory and associated test files, exceeding 400 LOC and involving multiple domains.
